name: Slime's War
description:
This game has been made in 48 hour for the GMTK Game Jam.

The theme was that "things" in the game have multiple purposes. Here is what I've done :

Timer = Kill the player at 00:00 and give score at the end.
Shoot = Fire an instant invisible beam in the direction of the cursor and reload weapon (0.4s).
Hit blue round = Remove 1s to the timer, tp the player to the cursor position and instant reload.
Hit enemy = Kill it, add 1s to the timer, tp the player to the cursor position and instant reload.
Coins = Add a challenge for those who wants and it give score at the end.
Powerups = Help you in the current run and add 5s to the timer.

Don't worry, there is a small tutorial at the beginning of the game :)

Have fun !
